model

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Player

  • public class Player
extends Object
    This class creates the player object. The parameters of a player such as color, name, etc. is managed by this class.
    Author:
    Team B

    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player()
        Default constructor.

      • Player

        public Player(GameInstance.PlayerColor color,
      String name,
      Config config)
        Creates a player with a specified color, name and configuration.
        Parameters:
        color - The color of the player - is linked with the color of the players castles.
        name - The name of the player.
        config - The configuration object to use for this player. This is coming from the GameInstance that is loading this player.

        Set the player color
        Parameters:
        playerColor - The color to set the player.

      • hasFirstTile

        public boolean hasFirstTile()
        Checks if a player has the first tile in hand (not already placed in board)
        Returns:
        Returns true if the player has tiles in hand - returns false otherwise.

      • getStrategy

        public PlayingStrategy getStrategy()
        Getter for the strategy of the player.
        Returns:
        Returns the players strategy.

      • setStrategy

        public void setStrategy(PlayingStrategy newStrategy)
        Setter for the strategy of the player.
        Parameters:
        newStrategy - The new strategy to set the player to.

      • getStatusDescription

        public String getStatusDescription()
        Gets a textual description for the player i.e. castles/tiles in hand, score.
        Returns:
        Textual description of the players current status is returned.

      • getScoreDescription

        public String getScoreDescription()
        Gets a textual description of the players score.
        Returns:
        Textual description of the players score.

      • evaluateCoinValue

        public int evaluateCoinValue()
        Evaluates and returns the players current score based on the coins the player has.
        Returns:
        The score of the player.

      • getEpochScore

        public int getEpochScore(int epochNo)
        Gets the player score for the specified epoch.
        Returns:
        The player score for the specified epoch.

      • setEpochScore

        public void setEpochScore(int epochNo,
                 int score)
        Sets the player score for the specified epoch no to the specified score.
        Parameters:
        epochNo - The epoch no whose score is to be set.
        score - The score to set to.

      • getScoreAllEpochs

        public int getScoreAllEpochs()
        Calculates the player score for all epochs.

        The players score for all epochs.
